resources.string: Step 1. You should buy the book to understand the program. Jim Wendler\'s site can be found here.
Step 2. Go to settings and enter your maxes, template choices, and other variations in the settings option.
Step 3. Hit calculate and happy lifting!
Enter your training maxes to each lift (it is suggested you start with 90% of your 1 rep max) or enter your real one rep max then press the calculate button to generate a training max.
